name: Geometrics
description:
Help Geo eat as many shapes as possible!

Geometrics is a hypercasual game in which you play as a figuroid named Geo. His life goal - and every creature should have a goal - is to eat as many shapes as possible. But, of course, there are obstacles on the way to his goal - bombs. Avoid them at all costs!

Anyway, the goal is simple - eat the pieces, avoid the bombs, and score as many points as possible! Bet you don't score a thousand?
